verses.verse: Do you <S%H552>indeed<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, O <S%H482>congregation<s%>? do you <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H4339>uprightly<s%>, O you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>?
<S%H3820>Yes<s%>, in heart you <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H5766>wickedness<s%>; you <S%H6424>weigh<s%> the <S%H2555>violence<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H2114>estranged<s%> from the <S%H7358>womb<s%>: they go <S%H8582>astray<s%> as soon as they are <S%H990>born<s%>, <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%>.
Their <S%H2534>poison<s%> is <S%H1823>like<s%> the <S%H2534>poison<s%> of a <S%H5175>serpent<s%>: they are like the <S%H2795>deaf<s%> <S%H6620>adder<s%> that <S%H331>stops<s%> her <S%H241>ears<s%>;
Which will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3907>charmers<s%>, <S%H2266>charming<s%> never so <S%H2449>wisely<s%>.
<S%H2040>Break<s%> their <S%H8127>teeth<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, in their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: break <S%H5422>out<s%> the great <S%H4459>teeth<s%> of the young <S%H3715>lions<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Let them melt <S%H3988>away<s%> as <S%H4325>waters<s%> which run <S%H1980>continually<s%>: when he <S%H1869>bends<s%> his bow to shoot his <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, let them be as cut in <S%H4135>pieces<s%>.

As a <S%H7642>snail<s%> which <S%H8557>melts<s%>, let every one of them pass <S%H1980>away<s%>: like the untimely <S%H5309>birth<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%>, that they may not <S%H2372>see<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%>.
Before your <S%H5518>pots<s%> can <S%H995>feel<s%> the <S%H329>thorns<s%>, he shall take them away as with a <S%H8175>whirlwind<s%>, both <S%H2416>living<s%>, and in his <S%H2740>wrath<s%>.

The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> when he <S%H2372>sees<s%> the <S%H5359>vengeance<s%>: he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H6471>feet<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.

So that a <S%H120>man<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Truly there is a <S%H6529>reward<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: truly he <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H430>God<s%> that <S%H8199>judges<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
